name: Sprite: Spirits Within
description:
You awaken in a forest, unsure of who or what you are. 
However, you do meet someone who claims you are Sprite, a forest reaper.

My first GameJam entry. While I didn't finish everything I wanted to do, it was a lot of fun!

You are able to reset a level by pausing (press esc) and then (r).

Trampoline shrooms can be picked up again if thrown.

There are 3 soul gems in total. They don't serve a purpose, but maybe for a later update.

Link to assets I've created

https://kluyastorm.itch.io/assets-gamejam-2022
